data.message: Thank you Facebook Team, I would like to thank you because of Facebook I've reunited with old friends and found some new friends. I'm on Ancestry DNA I didn't know any of my cousins on my Father's side. Thanks to you I have found cousins on Facebook. And I just found a 1st cousin. I'm so exited, I have Family!!!

replies.message: You're very welcome, Joye. We're glad you can stay connected to your family with Facebook. -Joe
Thank you and I love this family "Facebook", thanks to you for allowing us also to open ourselves on the world ....
Facebook i never got my notication for friends day can u help me please?

Obrigada  a todos pelos bons momentos que proporcionam-me; parabéns a equipe facebook que tem correspondido e muito com todas.as espectativas; nota 1000 (mil) por usarem tecnologia que nos faz viajar o mundo❤

Hi Kaitlynn. In order to receive a video, you'll need to have uploaded or been tagged in a certain amount of content during your time on Facebook. If you have enough content that meets the standard to generate a video, you'll see the video at the top of your News Feed. -Jon
tb .agradesco  o face .....tenho reencontrado muitas pessoas querida.....
